laws_and_regulations.name: International Traffic in Arms Regulations (ITAR)
laws_and_regulations.description: Regulates the export and import of defense-related articles and services.
laws_and_regulations.application: Ensures that the electronic components being purchased do not fall under restricted categories that require special licenses for international trade.

laws_and_regulations.name: RoHS Directive (Restriction of Hazardous Substances)
laws_and_regulations.description: Limits the use of specific hazardous materials found in electrical and electronic products.
laws_and_regulations.application: Ensures that the electronic components comply with environmental standards by restricting hazardous substances.

laws_and_regulations.name: Consumer Product Safety Improvement Act (CPSIA)
laws_and_regulations.description: Establishes safety standards and other requirements for consumer products.
laws_and_regulations.application: Ensures that the electronic components meet safety standards to prevent harm to consumers.

compliance_checklist.item: Verify if the electronic components require an ITAR license for export.
Check that the components comply with RoHS standards by reviewing material safety data sheets.
Ensure that the components meet CPSIA safety standards by obtaining certification from the supplier.
